function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential conflict of interest in research findings","Impact":"Undermined credibility of research, misleading conclusions","Mitigation":"Transparent disclosure of conflicts, independent review of findings","Technologies":"Ethics committees, conflict of interest disclosure systems","People":"Researchers, academic institutions","Owner":"Ethics committees, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Data privacy and security risks","Impact":"Compromised personal information, data breaches","Mitigation":"Data encryption, secure storage, regulatory compliance","Technologies":"Encryption tools, secure databases","People":"Research participants, data managers","Owner":"Research institutions, data management teams"}]}
